content: For the quarter ended September 30, and excluding PPP loans, our loan portfolio grew just under 2% for the quarter, with year-to-date growth of just under 7.5% or $2.6 billion outstanding. We've been through our portfolio and our stress tests and the type of properties that we have in our C&I customers, and we get very intense financial reporting either monthly or quarterly, and we do not see a -- there's always -- you can always find something, I suppose.
